io.ktor.routing

类 Route

  • ApplicationCallPipeline
    • io.ktor.routing.Route
  • 直接已知子类:
    Routing

    public class Route
extends ApplicationCallPipeline

    Describes a node in a routing tree

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Route

        public Route(Route parent,
             RouteSelector selector)

        Describes a node in a routing tree

        参数:
        parent - is a parent node in the tree, or null for root node
        selector - is an instance of class RouteSelector for this node
